content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE 156: Eersel vs. Sadiković*** was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on April 22, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background The event was headlined by a [ONE Lightweight Kickboxing World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Lightweight_World_Championship) bout between the reigning champion [Regian Eersel](/wiki/Regian_Eersel) and title challenger [Arian Sadiković](/wiki/Arian_Sadikovi%C4%87). The co-main event took place for the inaugural [ONE Women's Strawweight Muay Thai World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Women%27s_Strawweight_Muay_Thai_World_Championship) bout between [Jackie Buntan](/wiki/Jackie_Buntan) and [Smilla Sundell](/wiki/Smilla_Sundell). A strawweight MMA clash between #1-ranked Bokang Masunyane and #2-ranked [Jarred Brooks](/wiki/Jarred_Brooks) took place at the event. Former WBC and [WMC](/wiki/World_Muaythai_Council) Muay Thai World Champion [Liam Harrison](/wiki/Liam_Harrison_(kickboxer)) faced ["Elbow Zombie" Muangthai PK.Saenchai](/wiki/Muangthai_P.K._Saenchaimuaythaigym) in a bantamweight muay thai showdown and the strawweight mixed martial arts bout between [Namiki Kawahara](/wiki/Namiki_Kawahara) and [Danial Williams](/wiki/Danial_Williams) took place at the event. [Marcus Almeida](/wiki/Marcus_Almeida) returns to action against Oumar Kane. However, Kane withdrew due to Injury. A Strawweight bout between former ONE Strawweight Champion [Yosuke Saruta](/wiki/Yosuke_Saruta) and [Gustavo Balart](/wiki/Gustavo_Balart) was expected to take place at ONE: Bad Blood in February, but Saruta withdraw from the bout due to tested positive for COVID-19. The pairing was rebooked for this event. A kickboxing light heavyweight bout between former SUPERKOMBAT Super Cruiserweight Champion [Andrei Stoica](/wiki/Andrei_Stoica) and [Giannis Stoforidis](/wiki/Giannis_Stoforidis) was scheduled for the event. A Women's Atomweight Muay Thai bout between Former [Glory Women's Super Bantamweight Championship](/wiki/Glory_(kickboxing)#Champions) [Anissa Meksen](/wiki/Anissa_Meksen) and Estonian phenom Marie Ruumet was scheduled for the event. A Women's Strawweight bout between former Women's Strawweight title Challenger Ayaka Miura and Dayane Cardoso was scheduled for the event. [Mikey Musumeci](/wiki/Mikey_Musumeci) is to compete against Japanese MMA veteran [Masakazu Imanari](/wiki/Masakazu_Imanari) this particular bout will be a [Submission Grappling](/wiki/Submission_Grappling) match. ## Results Main Card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesLightweight Kickboxing[Regian Eersel](/wiki/Regian_Eersel) (c)def.[Arian Sadiković](/wiki/Arian_Sadikovi%C4%87)Decision (unanimous)53:00[a]Women's Strawweight Muay Thai[Smilla Sundell](/wiki/Smilla_Sundell)def.[Jackie Buntan](/wiki/Jackie_Buntan)Decision (unanimous)53:00[b]Catchweight (128 lbs)[Jarred Brooks](/wiki/Jarred_Brooks)def.Bokang MasunyaneTechnical Submission (rear-naked choke)14:39[c]Bantamweight Muay Thai[Liam Harrison](/wiki/Liam_Harrison_(kickboxer))def.[Muangthai P.K.Saenchai](/wiki/Muangthai_P.K._Saenchaimuaythaigym)TKO (three knockdowns)12:19BantamweightSong Min-jongdef.Chen RuiTechnical Submission (rear-naked choke)24:26Strawweight[Danial Williams](/wiki/Danial_Williams)def.[Namiki Kawahara](/wiki/Namiki_Kawahara)Decision (unanimous)35:00Lead Card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Strawweight[Gustavo Balart](/wiki/Gustavo_Balart)def.[Yosuke Saruta](/wiki/Yosuke_Saruta)Decision (unanimous)35:00Light Heavyweight Kickboxing[Andrei Stoica](/wiki/Andrei_Stoica)def.[Giannis Stoforidis](/wiki/Giannis_Stoforidis)Decision (majority)33:00[d]Women's Atomweight Muay Thai[Anissa Meksen](/wiki/Anissa_Meksen)def.Marie RuumetDecision (unanimous)33:00FlyweightWindson Ramosdef.Woo Sung-hoonDecision (unanimous)35:00Women's StrawweightDayane Souzadef.Ayaka MiuraTKO (shoulder injury)20:56LightweightAbraao Amorimdef.Dae Sung-parkTKO (knee and punches)21:20WelterweightJin Tae-hodef.Agilan ThaniSubmission (kimura)12:26Catchweight (142 lbs)[Mikey Musumeci](/wiki/Mikey_Musumeci)def.[Masakazu Imanari](/wiki/Masakazu_Imanari)Submission (rear-naked choke)14:09[e]FeatherweightKeanu Subbadef.James YangDecision (unanimous)35:00 ## Bonus awards The following fighters were awarded bonuses: - **$50,000 Performance of the Night: [Mikey Musumeci](/wiki/Mikey_Musumeci), Smilla Sundell** and **[Regian Eersel](/wiki/Regian_Eersel)** - **$100,000 Performance of the Night: [Liam Harrison](/wiki/Liam_Harrison_(kickboxer))** -
